properties.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 1 at 10:20AM AKST until January 2 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blizzard conditions are expected. Winds gusting as high
as 55 mph, will reduce visibilities to less than 1/4 mile.

* WHERE...Pribilof Islands.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 4 PM AKST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow
will significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are
expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds
and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout
conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel,
have a winter survival kit with you.

NWSheadline: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM AKST THURSDAY FOR THE PRIBILOF ISLANDS
